item.title: Monoprice Monolith THX-365T Bookshelf Speaker Review
item.description:
Foreword / YouTube Video Review

These speakers were loaned to me by Monoprice. They did not see the review before publication.

item.title: Monoprice THX-365C Center Channel Speaker Review
item.description:
Foreword / YouTube Video Review

This speaker was loaned to me by a viewer.

The review on this website is a brief overview and summary of the objective performance of this speaker. It is not intended to be a deep dive. Moreso, this is information for those who prefer “just the facts” and prefer to have the data without the filler. The video below has more discussion with respect to the technical merits and subjective notes I had during my listening sessions.
